HDG.IM.content: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?

HDG.BC.content: essential [the earlier?] has its own history (Geschichte), not calculable acc. ciphers (Marken) “new” & “old” [not new, but originary]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: essential [the earlier?] has its own history (Geschichte), not calculable acc. ciphers (Marken) “new” & “old” [not new, but originary]

HDG.BC.content: [in atomic age, in atomic physics] what is “unforeseeable (Unvorhersehbare),” can’t be calculated/computed in advance, shows itself as something new, can’t be explained by something else—lacks a cause (atomic physics, w/ its invalidation of law of causality, refutes Kant, all previous philosophy [?]) > what is “uncaused,” [acc. atomic physics]: “spontaneous,” free
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [in atomic age, in atomic physics] what is “unforeseeable (Unvorhersehbare),” can’t be calculated/computed in advance, shows itself as something new, can’t be explained by something else—lacks a cause (atomic physics, w/ its invalidation of law of causality, refutes Kant, all previous philosophy [?]) > what is “uncaused,” [acc. atomic physics]: “spontaneous,” free

HDG.BC.content: modernity grasps all experiencing, planning, constructing of actual unconditionally & correctly as the new [will to power?]: superiority of beings over Being has been decided > Being empty or a surplus?
HDG.BC.linkedContent: modernity grasps all experiencing, planning, constructing of actual unconditionally & correctly as the new [will to power?]: superiority of beings over Being has been decided > Being empty or a surplus?

HDG.WM.content: presumed soberness of mind, superiority of science: laughable when doesn’t take nothing seriously > it’s only because nothing is manifest that science can make beings themselves objects of investigation > new task of science (its essential task) to exist on basis of metaphysics, disclose entire expanse of truth in nature & history [?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: presumed soberness of mind, superiority of science: laughable when doesn’t take nothing seriously > it’s only because nothing is manifest that science can make beings themselves objects of investigation > new task of science (its essential task) to exist on basis of metaphysics, disclose entire expanse of truth in nature & history [?]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.FS.content: Being and Time attempts to open a hearing for word of Being (not new signification [is that possible?]), let it be claimed (in Anspruch) by Being: to be the there, matter of becoming claimed by Being [attention of Being]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Being and Time attempts to open a hearing for word of Being (not new signification [is that possible?]), let it be claimed (in Anspruch) by Being: to be the there, matter of becoming claimed by Being [attention of Being]

HDG.FS.content: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]

HDG.FS.content: the 2 possibilities of end of physics: 1) open to entirely new relation to nature 2) after research concludes settle into thoughtless exploitation (gedankenlosen Ausbeutung) of the discovery (Entdeckung)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: the 2 possibilities of end of physics: 1) open to entirely new relation to nature 2) after research concludes settle into thoughtless exploitation (gedankenlosen Ausbeutung) of the discovery (Entdeckung)

HDG.FS.content: more disturbing than space conquest, transformation of biology into biophysics: human can be produced acc. definite plan like any technological object > science can’t stop in time, can’t limit human desire for knowledge > reason for this event: modern relation to power (political), new form of nationalism must be thought through
HDG.FS.linkedContent: more disturbing than space conquest, transformation of biology into biophysics: human can be produced acc. definite plan like any technological object > science can’t stop in time, can’t limit human desire for knowledge > reason for this event: modern relation to power (political), new form of nationalism must be thought through

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]

HDG.FS.content: imperative of progress (Progressionszwang) demands imperative of production & imperative of ever new needs > what has been is only the outmoded (Überholten), entirely inconsequential [destruction of tradition]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: imperative of progress (Progressionszwang) demands imperative of production & imperative of ever new needs > what has been is only the outmoded (Überholten), entirely inconsequential [destruction of tradition]

HDG.FS.content: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]

HDG.MA.content: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)
HDG.MA.linkedContent: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)

HDG.MA.content: can a new ground/foundation be granted gain to man? new authochthony? > perhaps answer is near, near is always longest/hardest for humans > meditative thinking demands we not cling one-sidedly to a single idea: engage ourselves w/ what, at 1st sight, doesn’t go together at all [not a monomaniacal thought]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: can a new ground/foundation be granted gain to man? new authochthony? > perhaps answer is near, near is always longest/hardest for humans > meditative thinking demands we not cling one-sidedly to a single idea: engage ourselves w/ what, at 1st sight, doesn’t go together at all [not a monomaniacal thought]

HDG.MA.content: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things & openness to mystery (Geheimnis) belong together: give vision of new autochtony which might recapture autochtony in changed form
HDG.MA.linkedContent: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things & openness to mystery (Geheimnis) belong together: give vision of new autochtony which might recapture autochtony in changed form

HDG.MA.content: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots
HDG.MA.linkedContent: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots

HDG.CCP.content: [Heidegger’s method of giving word new meaning, e.g. the region, so it names something else]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: [Heidegger’s method of giving word new meaning, e.g. the region, so it names something else]

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.WL.content: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme

HDG.WL.content: to pursue Sprachwesen in thought, a change of Sprache is necessary that we can’t compel/invent, can’t just procure new words/phrases > concerns our relation to language, which is determined by destiny [how will language retain us in Ereignis?] : our Saying (always an answering) forever relational
HDG.WL.linkedContent: to pursue Sprachwesen in thought, a change of Sprache is necessary that we can’t compel/invent, can’t just procure new words/phrases > concerns our relation to language, which is determined by destiny [how will language retain us in Ereignis?] : our Saying (always an answering) forever relational

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt: inner illumination could impart such a different form to language, it would become totally other (ganz anderen) and new [presence worthy of the name?], an old shell (Gehäuse) w/ a new meaning
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt: inner illumination could impart such a different form to language, it would become totally other (ganz anderen) and new [presence worthy of the name?], an old shell (Gehäuse) w/ a new meaning

HDG.EC.content: national subjectivity remains in the international > international as mountain range, essential occurrence [das Wesende], of the national mountains
HDG.EC.linkedContent: national subjectivity remains in the international > international as mountain range, essential occurrence [das Wesende], of the national mountains

HDG.OHF.content: Kierkegaard documented pertinacity (Hartnäckigkeit) of dialectic most clearly, didn’t break free, his reading of paradox into New Testament/Christianity simply negative Hegelianism
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Kierkegaard documented pertinacity (Hartnäckigkeit) of dialectic most clearly, didn’t break free, his reading of paradox into New Testament/Christianity simply negative Hegelianism
